description.en: A dark gloomy castle with endless stairways and an ancient library. Scary, mysterious creatures live here, hiding in the night. One day, a girl who lost her memory ends up there. Who is she and how can she get back? And, most importantly, how will the owner of the castle decide her fate?

title.en: We Want to Talk About Kaguya-sama

altTitles.ru: Мы хотим поговорить о госпоже Кагуе

altTitles.ja: かぐや様を語りたい

description.en: In this 4-koma spinoff of Kaguya Wants to be Confessed to, the members of Shuchiin's Mass Media Club, Erika Kose and Karen Kino, idolize Student Council Vice President Kaguya Shinomiya. This is the comedic tale of two delusional girls who have absolutely no idea what goes on in the Student Council room!
description.ru: Ответвление сюжета манги "Кагуя хочет, чтобы ей признались: Гении — война любви и разума". Взгляд со стороны двух участниц клуба журналистики, которые боготворят Кагую, но совершенно не представляют, что на самом деле происходит в комнате студенческого совета.

The curtain rises on Pseudo-Singularity I.
The stage: Shinjuku. Fight alongside mysterious new Servants in a prison district cut off from the outside world.
description.ru: Новая сингулярность, которая появилась перед Рицуко Фуджимару, который спас мир. Чтобы исправить искажение истории, Фуджимару, который был перемещен в Синдзюку в 1999 год, встречает одного слугу, который называет себя «Арчер Синдзюку». В городе, где широко распространено зло, открывается занавес истории первого фрагмента!

description.en:
Continuation of the manga "Jesus". The legendary killer, hiding under the guise of school teacher Fujisawa Shingo, returns to Japan after more than ten years! What made him come back? What has he been doing for these ten years? Is one of his new students connected to 24?
Read on and find out in JESUS: Path of the Sandstorm!

altTitles.ja: リストルージュ

description.en: In a world where humans are protected by the Chimera tribe as an endangered species. As he spends time with a human girl, a certain emotion begins to grow in the heart of a Chimera boy.....!

altTitles.vi: Tiểu Đường Ở Đảo Quái Dị

description.en: Love is absolutely forbidden! Kaworu, the "public disciplinary commissioner of justice," uses a chainsaw to purge all the men of their sins in order to protect the purity of the girls! Standing in Kaworu's way is the "boy with high femininity," Takahisa, and Kaworu's sister, Mari, the "demon public disciplinary commissioner." In this parallel world of "Freak Island" set in Santa Maria Academy, a storm of blood and love is about to... erupt!!?

altTitles.ja: 回復術士のやり直し～即死魔法とスキルコピーの超越ヒール～
Redo OF healer
回復術士のやり直し

description.de: Keyaru wurde durch sein Unwissen immer und immer wieder ausgenutzt. Aber eines Tages erkannte er die wahre Macht der Heilmagie und kam zu der Überzeugung, dass ein Heiler die stärkste Klasse sei. Wie auch immer, ehe ihm das Potential eines Heilers klar wurde, war er bereits allem beraubt worden. Daher wandte er seine Heilmagie auf die Welt selbst an und reiste so 4 Jahre in der Zeit zurück. Er würde sich für alles rächen, was man ihm angetan hatte. Dies ist die kranke heldenhafte Geschichte eines Heilers, der der stärkste wurde, indem er sein Wissen über Heilung und seine Erfahrungen aus seinem vorherigen Leben kombiniert.
description.en:
"Healing magicians cannot fight alone."   
Keyaru, who was bound by this common knowledge, was exploited again and again by others.  
But one day, he noticed what lay beyond healing magic, and was convinced that a healing magician was the strongest class. However, by the time he realized that potential, he was deprived of everything. Thus, he used healing magic on the world itself to go back four years, deciding to redo everything.  
This is a heroic tale of one healing magician who became the strongest by using knowledge from his past life and healing magic.
description.it:
"I maghi curatori non possono combattere da soli." Keyaru, che era legato a questa conoscenza comune, fu sfruttato più e più volte dagli altri.  
Ma un giorno notò cosa c'era oltre la guarigione della magia e si convinse che il mago guaritore fosse la classe più forte. Tuttavia, quando ne realizzò il potenziale, fu privato di tutto. Così, usando la magia curativa sul mondo stesso, è tornato indietro di quattro anni, determinato a ricominciare tutto da capo.
description.pl:
"Uzdrowiciele nie mogą walczyć w pojedynkę."  
Keare, który wiedział o tym aż za dobrze, był raz po raz wykorzystywany przez innych.  
Ale pewnego dnia odkrywa coś, co kryje się poza magią uzdrowienia, i zyskuje pewność, że uzdrowiciel to najpotężniejsza z klas maga. Jednakże zanim zdał sobie sprawę z jej potencjału, został już pozbawiony wszystkiego, co miał. Dlatego właśnie użył magii uzdrowienia na samym świecie, by cofnąć się w czasie o cztery lata, postanawiając, że zacznie wszystko od nowa.  
Oto heroiczna opowieść o pewnym uzdrowicielu, który stał się najsilniejszym dzięki wykorzystaniu wiedzy z dawnego życia i magii uzdrawiania.
description.pt-br:
"Magos de cura não podem lutar sozinhos." 

Keare, que estava vinculado por esse conhecimento comum, foi explorado uma vez ou outra pelos outros. Mas um dia, ele notou o que estava além da magia de cura e estava convencido de que um mago de cura era a classe mais forte. No entanto, quando percebeu esse potencial, ele estava privado de tudo. Assim, ele usou a magia de cura no próprio mundo para voltar quatro anos, decidindo refazer tudo. Este é um conto heroico de um mago de cura que se tornou o mais forte usando o conhecimento de sua vida passada e magia de cura.

description.en: An omnibus of horror stories that explores relatable, everyday fears experienced in the contemporary Reiwa era. Each story in the series reflects modern anxieties, focusing on the fears lurking within daily life, which continue to escalate.

description.en: Akira, a demonically strong S-class exorcist, is sent from Germany to investigate a paranormal event in a certain city in Japan. He destroys creatures from other worlds with his beautiful exorcist partner Chikage.
description.es: Akira es un exorcista de clase S que es enviado desde Alemania para investigar un incidente sobrenatural en cierta ciudad de Japón. Él y su compañera, la hermoso exorcista Chikage, acabarán a las criaturas que han venido de otro mundo.
description.id: Akira adalah pengusir setan kelas S yang dikirim dari Jerman untuk menyelidiki insiden supernatural di kota tertentu di Jepang. Dia dan rekannya, pengusir setan cantik Chikage, akan menghabisi makhluk yang datang dari dunia lain.
description.ja:
この主人公、破天荒にして最強の退魔師＜エクソシスト＞

日本のとある都市で起きた超常現象事件を調査しに、ドイツから派遣されたS級退魔師アキラ。相棒の美人退魔師チカゲと共に異世界よりやってきたクリーチャー共を撃ち！殴り！ぶったおしまくる！！
description.pt-br: Este protagonista, o mais demonicamente poderoso exorcista. Akira, o exorcista de classe S, foi enviado da Alemanha para investigar um evento paranormal em uma certa cidade do Japão. Ele atira em criaturas de outros mundos com sua bela parceira exorcista, Chikage.

altTitles.ja: リィンカーネーションの花弁

description.en: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…
description.vi: Cố gắng tìm kiếm tài năng, Senji Touya thử mọi thứ có thể để tìm ra nó. Kiếm đạo, nhảy múa, bơi lội, bóng rổ, bóng đá, cờ vua… bất cứ thứ gì cậu thử, cậu đều không thể vượt trội. Một ngày nọ, cô bạn cùng lớp của cậu, Haito, tới trường sau một thời gian dài vắng mặt. Senji coi cô là người "có nó" – một người có tài năng. Sau đó, cậu phát hiện ra rằng cô không chỉ là một người có tài năng mà còn là người đã "lấy" tài năng của mình từ kiếp trước. Và, những người "lấy" tài năng từ kiếp trước của họ còn được gọi là "Những Kẻ Trở Lại"…
description.pt-br: Na busca por um talento só seu, Senji Touya tenta de tudo para encontrá-lo. Kendou, dança, natação, basquete, futebol, xadrez… em tudo o que ele tenta, ele não consegue se destacar. Um dia, sua colega de classe, Haito, vem à escola pela primeira vez em muito tempo. Senji se refere a ela como alguém que “possui algo” ou alguém que tem um verdadeiro talento. Mais tarde, ele descobriu que ela não é apenas alguém que tem talento, mas alguém que “conseguiu” o talento de si mesma através de sua vida passada. E, aqueles que “conseguem” o talento de suas vidas passadas, também são conhecidos como “Reencarnados” …

description.en: A spin-off of the series *[The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten](https://mangadex.org/title/2fec6641-beb1-4ae9-a32f-204dd06688ac/the-angel-next-door-spoils-me-rotten)* which comicalizes the stories from Volume 5.5 of the Light Novel and its special edition booklet, which contains additional short stories.
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まり二人は少しずつ惹かれあっていく――。

title.en: I Want to Live a Good Life

description.en: The best in the world, excellent martial arts, overflowing money and pleasure----the center of the magical world, Black Astronomy. Kang Hee-ran, the granddaughter of the owner of Heukcheonmun, lives a life that has nothing to lack and nothing to be envied of, but dies at the hands of her stepmother. And for some reason, Heeran reverted to her younger self! In the life that started again, she goes down quietly and kindly with her warm nanny. The first step of revenge begins with making the third Confucius, Kang Lun, the king of the underworld who will soon rule Black Astronomy, into a man of Heiran...!!  I was trying to live...  Heeran's stepmother didn't like the way he looked and started to kill all of Heeran's people.  And Heeran went to the bottom of the Dark Astronomical Gate to the realm of the deep hell for revenge.

altTitles.ja: 踊り場にスカートが鳴る

altTitles.en: The Skirt Sings at the Landing
The Skirt Rings at the Landing

description.en:
Haruma Kiki always dreamed of doing ballroom dance as the feminine "follower" role, but as she aged she only grew taller and taller, eventually causing her to give up ever looking good in a dress or anything ladylike. Now, as a second year in high school, she specializes in the masculine "leader" role—until one day, her partner suddenly leaves her. When Toribami Michiru, a short and pretty first year, shows up wanting to join the ballroom dance club, Kiki asks her to be her new partner, but Michiru reveals that she only plays the leader role—and she wants none other than Kiki as her partner.  
  
Bimonthly serialisation in Yuri Hime.
description.es-la: Haruma Kiki siempre soñó con hacer bailes de salón como el papel de "seguidora" femenina, pero a medida que pasaban los años solo crecía más y más alta, lo que finalmente hizo que renunciara a verse bien con un vestido o cualquier cosa de dama. Ahora, en su segundo año de secundaria, se especializa en el papel de "líder" masculina, hasta que un día, su pareja la abandona de repente. Cuando Toribami Michiru, una pequeña y linda chica de primer año, aparece queriendo unirse al club de baile de salón, Kiki le pide que sea su nueva compañera, pero Michiru revela que ella solo juega el papel de líder, y ella no quiere nada menos que a Kiki como su compañera.

altTitles.en: The Male Lead Is in Charge of the Successor
The Dark History of the Male Lead

altTitles.zh: 男主要我对他的黑历史负责

description.en: After being neglected in her past life, Izelle is ecstatic to be reborn as a rich character until her family suddenly goes bankrupt! While thinking about what to do, she's given the perfect chance to solve her financial crisis when she saves young Archduke Karl Byron from being bullied. Unfortunately, Karl doesn't remember her at all when they reunite as adults, and she has no choice but to coerce him into helping her. Can Izelle get what she wants, or will Karl be more trouble than he's worth?

title.en: Forget My Husband, I'll Go Make Money

altTitles.en: Forget About My Husband, I'd Rather Go Make Money

altTitles.uk: Годі з мене чоловіка - йду заробляти гроші

altTitles.zh: 要什么老公，我只想搞钱

altTitles.en: Forget About My Husband, I'd Rather Go Make Money

altTitles.es-la: Terminé con mi esposo, ahora iré a hacer dinero

description.en:
I became the wife of a husband who has a girlfriend.
Hmm, I shouldn’t bother them, right?

“Then, you sleep on the floor.”
“What?”

It seems that he doesn’t like the idea of it.
Well, the floor is hard after all.
I guess I don’t have any other choice.

“We’ll just sleep while holding hands then. You trust me, right?”

But how did we end up breaking the bed on our first night…?

I am Aristine, an exiled princess who has fallen out of favor with the Emperor.
The truth is, she has the <Monarch’s Eyes>, an ability that allows you to see the past, future, and present.
Sacrificed for a contract marriage, she is bound together with a monstrous barbarian…

“I have to present my wife with the most precious things.”

The future husband who is rumored to be a monster is incredibly normal.

But this cake belongs to someone else.

“I’ll just go and make money.”

It’s long been said that imagining gold as your own will help you manifest wealth.

<Forget My Husband, I’ll Go Make Money>
Will she be able to achieve her dreams of living in freedom while sitting on her piles of money?
Or will she be able to catch both rabbits at the same time?

altTitles.es-la: El diario de crianza con el Villano

description.en: Mary didn’t know what to expect of the afterlife, but it certainly wasn’t becoming the evil, murderous nanny of the novel she was reading. Her circumstances become secondary concerns when she realizes that no matter what, Briel must remain safe. It’s the only way to keep his uncle, Count Kentryle Chalant, from the path of revenge. Can she keep her new charge safe and change the entire plot, or will the true villain get the best of them all? And is she going to find love on the way?

altTitles.ja: ギルティサークル

description.en: April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
description.ja: ４月！憧れの青応大学へと入学した大学１年生・沢屋童二は、サークル勧誘期に美少女・星見楓と出会う。「東京に行けば…大学に入れば…サークルに入れば、彼女ができる！」と信じる沢屋は星見楓とともに派手目なサークルの新歓コンパへと参加するが……。沢屋が足を踏み入れたサークルの罪深き実態、秘密とは何か！？
description.pt-br: Abril! A vida universitária de Sawaya Doji em sua escola de sonho da Universidade de Seio começa com um encontro com a bela Kaede Hoshimi durante a feira de recrutamento do clube. Sawaya acredita que se ele for para Tóquio... se ele entrar em uma universidade... se ele entrar em um clube, ele pode conseguir uma namorada! É uma ótima maneira de conhecer novas pessoas, mas em que tipo de clube ele se meteu?

title.en: Prices Depreciated, and I Became the World's Richest Person

altTitles.zh: 开局物价贬值，我成为了世界首富

description.en: I woke up to find the world had changed! Prices everywhere have decreased by a million times, yet my funds remain the same, making me wealthier than the world’s richest person! How should I spend all this money…

altTitles.ja: マオ

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

With her fierce eyes and sharp impression, and wary of everyone, 'Ahn Se-young' is a woman to watch out for.
Everyone is cautious around her, but a lone boy stands in front of her.
"I like you, go out with me!"
"......What?!"
Se-young is taken aback at the sudden confession of love, but this was just the beginning...
The tug-of-war between 'Ahn Se-young', who shows an unexpected side to her as you get closer, and 'Nam Ho-yeol', the straightforward guy who tries to break down her impenetrable facade, begins now!
description.ko:
사나운 눈매와 날카로운 인상으로 주변 사람들에게 경계를 받고 있는 요주의 그녀 '안세영'.
모두가 경계심을 놓지 못할 때 그녀의 앞에 한 남자애가 마주선다.
"나 너 좋아해, 나랑 사귀자!"
"......뭐?!"
난데없는 사랑고백에 진땀이 빠지는 세영, 하지만 이건 시작에 불과했으니...
가까이 다가갈수록 반전의 모습을 보이는 그녀 '안세영'과
그 모습을 빈틈없이 파고 들려는 직진남 '남호열'의 줄다리기가 지금 시작된다!

title.en: Isekai de Mizu no Dai Seirei Yattemasu

altTitles.ja: 異世界で水の大精霊やってます。

description.en: When the laid-back high school student Saejima Nagi wakes up from a nap, he finds himself in a lake in another world!? After learning that he is the "Great Water Spirit" whose essence is the lake, Nagi uses the power that resides within him to heal those suffering from injuries and illnesses. One day, Nagi is led by a voice calling for help and is summoned by a boy. This encounter will greatly change Nagi's fate...
description.ja: のんびり屋の高校生・冴島凪（サエジマ ナギ）が居眠りから目覚めると、異世界の湖になっていた!? 自分が湖を本体とする「水の大精霊」であると知ったナギは、怪我や病で苦しむ者たちを自らに宿る力で癒していく。ある日、ナギは助けを求める声に導かれ、ひとりの少年に召喚される。その出会いが、ナギの運命を大きく変えることになり――。

altTitles.ja: 恋より青く

description.en: Takamine, who can't find anything she likes, and Sakikura, who loves books. The two girls meet by chance and spend their after-school hours together. Are they friends? Or is it a nameless relationship spun between the two girls?
description.id: Takamine, yang tak dapat menemukan sesuatu yang disukai. Dan Sakura, yang menyukai buku. Keduanya bertemu secara kebetulan saat sepulang sekolah.

altTitles.ja: カードファイト！！ ヴァンガード YouthQuake

description.en:
"I Think it's time for me to stop...playing Vanguard." "You've Got to Grow out of this Kid's Game."
Sentatsu Meguru, a first-year high school student, was wondering whether or not to continue playing Vanguard when his childhood friends and classmates are starting to quit.
One day, the master of his favorite café takes him to a fight with his grandfather,Kuranaga Sanzou.
Through the fight, Sanzou asks him a question, which leads him to look into his own mind, and is naturally led to the answer.
"I love it so much, there's no way I can stop!"
Then, he awoke to a strange power that allowed him to see the unit and the light that was connected to it on the board.
Quake your Soul!! A new story that Leads you to Vanguard!

altTitles.ja: 輝夜姫

altTitles.th: เจ้าหญิงจันทรา

description.en:
On Kabuchi-jima, an island ruled by Princess Kaguya, ten children were raised as sacrificial victims. Several of the children thought they had escaped their fate when they escaped the island. But nearly a decade later, the kids are still dying in the order and at the time they would have as sacrifices… Their only hope now is to reunite and return to the island to seek out and destroy the source–the legend, the blood-lusting Moon Princess–before time runs out.  
  
In 2002 Kaguya Hime received the 47th annual Shogakukan Manga Award for shoujo.

altTitles.ja: 妹が分 裂した。

description.en:
After years of barely talking to her big brother, Uiha suddenly wakes up to find that she has a body-double, who is both her copy and her complete opposite.

---
[Alt. Raw](https://www.pixiv.net/user/209814/series/72439)
description.it: Dopo anni in cui Uiha non ha quasi mai rivolto la parola a suo fratello, un giorno si sveglia scoprendo di avere un suo clone tanto uguale a lei quanto completamente il suo opposto.

description.en:
Joonwoo hates school and has trouble making friends. The only time he's happy is when he's talking to strangers on the Random Chatting phone app. That's how Joonwoo ends up befriending a girl on RanChat who turns out to be his classmate Sungah but she has no idea about it! Will Joonwoo be able to fight his social anxiety and become closer to her in real life?  

---

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no Koto ga Daidaidaidaidaisuki na 100-nin no Kanojo
Kimi no Koto ga Dai Dai Dai Dai Daisuki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho
Mis 100 novias que me quieren mucho mucho

altTitles.vi: 100 Cô Bạn Gái Này Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất Là Yêu Tôi Đó

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.it: Le 100 fidanzate che ti amano tanto tanto tanto tanto tanto

description.en: Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ja: 「好き」っていいたい！いわれたい！中学卒業式に100回目の失恋をした愛城恋太郎は、高校でこそ初めての彼女を！と願う。そんな彼の前に現れた恋の神様が告げた未来は「高校生活で出会う“運命の人”は100人。しかし彼女達は、幸せになれなければなんやかんや（中略）あって…死ぬ」　突然始まるDEAD OR LOVEな純愛ハーレムライフ!!　絶対に脱落しない・させない！
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

altTitles.ja: アオアシ

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: サーシャちゃんとクラスメイトオタクくん

altTitles.es-la: La chica de secundaria Sasha-chan y su compañero de clases Otaku-kun

altTitles.vi: Bé sơ trung Sasha và thằng bạn Otaku cùng lớp

description.en:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me “Master”!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
description.fr:
Fujiwara est un mangaka amateur, il dessine des mangas érotiques alors qu’il n’est que collégien. Tandis qu'il lisait un porno à l'école, une jolie fille nommée Sasha qui s’avère être très intéressée par ces choses, et lui adresse la parole, elle se met même à l’appeler "Maître" !? 

  C’est l'histoire d'une belle et joyeuse fille qui se porte volontaire pour être mon disciple dans la perversion.
description.ja: 僕は未来の大漫画家にして現えっちな同人誌アシの中学生。学校で同人誌を読んでいたら、えっち方面に興味津々の美少女、サーシャさんから「ししょー」と呼ばれ‥‥!?
description.es-la: Sin importarle el qué dirán y sin temor a caer en lo más bajo de la escala social dentro de la escuela, Otaku-kun no oculta su gran afición por los mangas para adultos, cosa que le hace ganarse el rechazo de su salón apenas en el primer día de clases; sin embargo, Sasha, lejos de sentir aberración por su afición, muestra un interés peculiar, iniciando así una relación... ¡¿mentor-alumna?!

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament… His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He’ll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he’s human… Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

altTitles.ja: ブルーロック

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr:
Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.

title.en: Danzai sareta Akuyaku Reijou wa, Gyakkou shite Kanpeki na Akujo wo Mezasu

altTitles.ja: 断罪された悪役令嬢は、逆行して完璧な悪女を目指す
断罪された悪役令嬢は、逆行して完璧な悪女を目指す＠COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Danzaisareta Akuyaku Reijou wa, Gyakkou shite Kanpeki na Akujo wo Mezasu
Danzaisareta Akuyaku Reijou wa, Gyakkou shite Kanpeki na Akujo wo Mezasu @COMIC

altTitles.en: The Condemned Villainess Goes Back in Time and Aims to Become the Ultimate Villain

altTitles.es: La villana condenada regresa en el tiempo para convertirse en la villana perfecta

altTitles.ko: 단죄당한 악역 영애는 회귀하여 완벽한 악녀를 노린다

altTitles.zh: 被定罪的恶人千金、重生后目标是成为完美恶女

description.en:
An exhilarating romantic fantasy about a duke's daughter, a former prostitute, controlling the poison within evil!

The duke's daughter, Claudia, was supposed to be the fiancée of the crown prince, however her half-sister, Fermina's, schemes had her sold off to a brothel. She didn't want to end it like this, so she climbed to the top at the brothel, but ended up dying from an illness. Except, when she opened her eyes, the face of when she was a child looked back at her. Realizing she had gone back in time, Claudia wins over more and more supporters using the tactics she learnt during her days as a prostitute to prepare for her nearing conflict with Fermina.

"If Fermina is considered a villainess, I shall aim to become the ultimate villain!"
description.ja:
「あなたが悪女なら、それを超える"完璧な悪女"になってみせますわ! 」

王太子の婚約者だったはずが、異母妹・フェルミナの策略により娼館へと売られてしまった公爵令嬢・クラウディア。このまま終わるわけにはいかないという一心で娼館のナンバーワンに上りつめるも、病死してしまう。しかし、目が覚めると鏡には子供の頃の自分が! 過去へ逆行したクラウディアは、きたるべきフェルミナとの戦いに向けて、娼婦として身につけた手練手管で周りを次々と味方に引き込んでいく——。

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6406gp/)

**Original Web Publication:** [Corona Comics](https://to-corona-ex.com/comics/49602840559659), [Nico Video](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/58462)
description.es-la: La hija del duque, Claudia, debía ser la prometida del príncipe heredero, sin embargo, los planes de su hermanastra, Fermina, hicieron que la vendieran a un burdel. Ella no quería terminar de esa manera, así que escaló a la cima del burdel, pero terminó muriendo de una enfermedad. Pero cuando abrió los ojos, la cara de una niña le devolvió la mirada. Al darse cuenta de que ha retrocedido en el tiempo, Claudia gana cada vez más adeptos utilizando las tácticas que aprendió durante sus días como prostituta para prepararse para su inminente conflicto con Fermina. "Si Fermina es considerada una villana, ¡yo aspiraré a convertirme en la villana perfecta!"

title.en: Tensei Kizoku, Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi o Uketsuida node, Yuushuu na Jinzai o Fuyashiteitara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~

altTitles.ja: 転生貴族、鑑定スキルで成り上がる～弱小領地を受け継いだので、優秀な人材を増やしていたら、最強領地になってた～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Kizoku Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi wo Uketsuidanode, Yuushuuna Jinzai wo Fuyashite Itara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~

altTitles.en: As a Reincarnated Aristocrat, I'll Use My Appraisal Skill to Rise in the World: I Inherited a Weak Territory, and If I Increase the Number of Capable Personnel, It Will Become the Strongest Territory

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生貴族，以鑑定技能成名～因為繼承了弱小的領地，所以如果增加了優秀的人才，就會成為最強的領地～

altTitles.id: Terlahir kembali menjadi seorang bangsawan dengan skill penilaian
Seorang bangsawan yang bereinkarnasi, bangkit dengan kemampuan analisis

altTitles.pt-br: Como um Aristocrata Reencarnado, Usarei Minha Habilidade de Avaliação para Subir no Mundo

altTitles.vi: Quý Tộc Tái Sinh Thăng Tiến Nhờ Kỹ Năng Thẩm Định: Vì Thừa Kế Một Lãnh Địa Nhỏ Yếu, Nên Khi Tuyển Dụng Người Tài, Đã Trở Thành Lãnh Địa Mạnh Nhất
Tái Sinh Thành Quý Tộc Với Kĩ Năng "Thẩm Định"

description.en: After being reincarnated, Ars Louvent is supposed to live in a different world as a weak aristocrat. Both his physical strength and intelligence were mediocre in both worlds, but here he naturally possessed a skill called "Appraisal" that allowed him to see the potential of any person. By gathering talented people by his side, Ars uses this "Appraisal" skill to transform his weak territory into the strongest one! But the road ahead of him won't be so simple.
description.ja: 転生し、弱小貴族として異世界を生きることになったアルス・ローベント。現代同様、異世界でも体力・知力ともに平凡だったが、“鑑定スキル”という人の潜在能力を知ることが出来るスキルを生まれつき所持していた。アルスは自分の民たちを守るため、“鑑定スキル”で弱小領地を最強の領地へと変貌させていく───！
description.vi: Sau khi được tái sinh, Ars Louvent được cho là một quý tộc yếu kém. Cả sức mạnh thể chất và trí tuệ của cậu đều ở mức trung bình ở cả 2 thế giới. Nhưng cậu sở hữu một kĩ năng độc nhất có tên ' Thẩm định' cho phép cậu có thể nhìn được chỉ số và tiềm năng của mọi người. Bằng cách tập hợp những người tài năng về bên cạnh, Ars sẽ sử dụng kĩ năng 'Thẩm định' này để khiến lãnh thổ yếu ớt của mình thành nơi mạnh nhất! Nhưng con đường phía trước của cậu sẽ không hề dễ dàng.
description.pt-br: Após ser reencarnado, Ars Louvent deve viver em um mundo diferente como um aristocrata fraco. Tanto sua força física quanto sua inteligência eram medíocres em ambos os mundos, mas aqui ele naturalmente possuía uma habilidade chamada “Avaliação” que lhe permitia ver o potencial de qualquer pessoa. Ao reunir pessoas talentosas ao seu lado, Ars usa esta habilidade de “Avaliação” para transformar seu território fraco no mais forte! Mas o caminho à sua frente não será tão simples.

altTitles.ja: 乱破～ヤンキー忍風帖～

description.en: Kazama Endo is the ultimate delinquent, unbeaten in a fight. He goes to scope out a boy who beat up his henchmen, but it turns out this boy is anything but ordinary!

title.en: Blue Archive x Kamen Rider Decade - Story of Tsukasa Kadoya Sensei in Schale (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: シャーレの門矢士先生概念

altTitles.vi: Blue Archive x Kamen Rider Decade - Câu chuyện về thầy giáo Schale Kadoya Tsukasa

description.en: Anyone who is a fan of the Kamen Rider genre probably knows Kamen Rider Decade, also known as Kadoya Tsukasa;  world destroyer... The story is about Decade working as a sensei in the Blue Archive world

title.en: Ano Toki Tasukete Itadaita Monster Musume desu.

altTitles.ja: あのとき助けていただいたモンスター娘です。
「あのとき助けていただいたモンスター娘です。」異世界おっさん教師 突然のモテ期に困惑する

altTitles.ja-ro: "Ano Toki Tasukete Itadaita Monster Musume desu.": Isekai Ossan Kyoushi Totsuzen no Moteki ni Konwaku suru

altTitles.zh: 那个时候被你拯救了的那个魔物娘是我的说。

altTitles.vi: Cô bé ấy là con quái vật mà tôi đã cứu lấy năm xưa

description.en: Some 20 years have passed since the protagonist was summoned to another world and retired from the army. He is still single in his 40s and lives as a low-ranking professor, until one day, an elite 'monster girl' transfers into his class.
description.ja: 異世界に召喚され、軍を退役してから約20年。主人公は未だ独身で、もう40代も半ば。Eランクの落ちこぼれ教師として生活するある日、彼の学園にエリートの「モンスター娘」が転校してくるのだった。。
description.vi: Câu chuyện về một ông giáo trung niên (trước đây là một anh hùng) ở dị giới tình cờ gặp lại cô học trò vốn dĩ là con bạch tuộc cute phô mai que mà anh từng cứu giúp và dạy dỗ trước đây.
description.pt-br: Cerca de 20 anos se passaram desde que o protagonista foi convocado para outro mundo e se aposentou do exército. Ele ainda está solteiro na casa dos 40 anos e vive como um professor de baixo escalão, até que um dia, uma 'garota monstro' de elite é transferida para sua classe.

altTitles.ja: ノアズノーツ
诺亚笔记

description.en: Professor Noah Minami Umberbach is not your average archeologist! For one, he's prone to whipping out his gun and blowing up stuff to make dramatic entrances. But that's just his eccentric nature. He's actually a man on a mission. A mission that may very well be the most important mission of all time. And he's dragging history-hating student Kotobuki Mirai along for the ride!

altTitles.ja: 腹ペコのマリー

description.en:
From the author of Beelzebub.  
  
Taiga is the heir to a Buddhist temple, while Anna is the poster child of the neighboring church. Normally these two star-crossed lovers would be just that. However, one day, Taiga discovers that Anna's church has a plan to resurrect a certain French aristocrat…
description.pt-br: Bijogi Taiga é um garoto que vive num templo taoista e é apaixonado por Sagimiya Anna, sua vizinha que mora numa igreja. Um dia, Taiga a encontra realizando um treinamento para um ritual de invocação muito estranho e na tentativa de se aproximar dela, aceita fazer parte do ritual... Mal sabia ele que seria usado como SACRIFÍCIO para invocar... Maria Teresa Carlota de França? A antiga rainha francesa?!

altTitles.ja: 不滅のあなたへ

altTitles.th: แด่เธอผู้เป็นนิรันดร์

description.en:
An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra.   
The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever?   

---   
- **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** 
   
---

description.fr:
"C'est à l'épreuve de la réalité que je saurai ce que je suis... Voilà pourquoi mon voyage commence."

Un être sous forme d'une petite sphère est envoyé sur terre, celle-ci change d'apparence en fonction de ce qu'elle rencontre.
Elle rencontre d'abord un loup puis un jeune garçon vivant seul au milieu d'un paysage enneigé. Chaque nouvelle rencontre est une occasion de vivre de nouvelles expérience pour cet être. Ainsi commence le voyage de l'Immortel, un voyage fait d'expériences et de rencontres dans un monde implacable...
description.ja: 『聲の形』の大今良時が贈る、永遠の旅。真っ白な魂で世界に降り立つ！──現実だけが自分が誰なのかを教えてくれる。だから僕は、旅に出る。
description.ru: Отправленное на землю бессмертное существо знакомится с мальчиком, одиноко живущим в Тундре. Существо может принимать форму умерших, но только если «импульс» сильнее предыдущего. С какими впечатлениями и встречами столкнётся существо, живущее вечно?
description.pt-br:
Um ser imortal foi enviado à superfície da terra e encontrou um menino que vivia sozinho no meio da tundra.
O ser pode assumir a forma de coisas moribundas, mas somente se o "ímpeto" for mais forte que o anterior. Que tipo de experiências e encontros o ser encontrará enquanto viver para sempre?

---
- **Ganhou o 43º Prêmio Kodansha Manga na categoria shounen em 2019**

description.en:
Is the terrible heartache caused by a distant lover? Or is it the ties and obsession that follow along, like love that won't come true...?
*From the same author of Missing Love: The Marrying Man

title.en: Yuusha no Mago to Maou no Musume

altTitles.ja: 勇者の孫と魔王の娘

altTitles.en: The Hero's Granddaughter and the Demon King's Daughter

altTitles.es: La nieta del Heroe y la hija del Señor de los Demonios

altTitles.ru: Внучка Героя и дочь Короля демонов

description.en: After the great battle between the Demon King and the Hero, justice prevailed and the devils scattered. The Demon King was killed. A few years later, the Demon King's daughter went on a journey to find her father's heritage, and met the granddaughter of the Hero.
description.ja: かつて世界を揺るがした魔族対人間の大戦争。敗北した魔王一族最後の生き残りである魔王の娘・ダクネは、50年にもおよぶ投獄から解放され、自身の故郷である旧魔族領を訪れていた。そこで彼女が出逢ったのはサクラコと名乗る黒髪の少女。なんと少女は、一族を倒した憎き仇敵である勇者の孫だった!!

title.en: Surviving the Game as a Barbarian

altTitles.es-la: Sobreviviendo al juego siendo un bárbaro

altTitles.fr: Surviving the Game as a Barbarian
Survivre dans le jeu en incarnant un Barbare

description.en:
After spending nine years on Dungeon and Stone, the role-playing game that no player has ever beaten, Lee Hansoo finally reaches the dungeon of the final boss.

As soon as he opens the gate, however, he suddenly sees a message that says his tutorial has been completed and finds himself in the body of Bjorn Yandel, a real barbarian within the game.

An exciting adventure awaits him as he endeavors to abide by the laws of the fictional world!

----
[Additional Official English translation (Tappytoon)](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/surviving-the-game-as-a-barbarian)
description.ko:
지금껏 아무도 클리어하지 못한 게임 [던전 앤 스톤]을 9년간 플레이한 끝에 최종 보스 스테이지에 도달한 이한수.
그러나 보스 방에 입장함과 동시에, 튜토리얼 완료라는 멘트와 함께 [던전 앤 스톤] 속 바바리안 '비요른 얀델'에 빙의하게 된다.

도시에서 부과하는 막대한 세금을 내지 못하면 '하층민'으로 사형당한다.
빙의한 사실을 들키면 '악령'이라고 판단되어 살해당한다.
살아남을 수 있는 유일한 길은 미궁에 들어가 목숨을 걸고 싸우는 것뿐.

9년간 쌓아온 공략법과 무식하게 강한 바바리안의 육체로, 반드시 이 게임에서 살아남겠다!

title.en: Hero x Demon King x Villain

altTitles.es-la: Héroes y Reyes, Demonios y Villanos

description.en:
A noble <Hero> who punishes evil while under the protection of gods.
A demon born with tremendous demonic powers, is the last surviving <Demon King>.
And I’m an experienced third-rate <Villiain> that roams around the land.

I want my Villain’s life to be over.
I was going to retire and spend the rest of my life in comfort but the child I picked up by accident turned out to be the demon king and the hero is chasing me to "repay the favor".
My comfortable retirement years are ruined!

The 99 demons that guard the Villain ?
Prepare to die… Yes, may God bless you, now die!
description.ko:
신들의 가호를 받아 악을 처단하는 고결한 ‘영웅’.
악마의 힘을 받아 태어난 강력한 마족 최후의 생존자 ‘마왕’.
악의 조직을 전전하는 숙련된 삼류 ‘악당’.

악당 생활도 이젠 끝이다. 은퇴해서 편안한 여생을 보내려 했더니
우연히 주운 녀석은 마왕이고, 영웅 녀석은 은혜를 갚겠답시고 찾아와
내 편안한 은퇴 생활을 망치고 있다!

악당을 가호하는 아흔아홉 악마시여….
신의 축복이나 받고 뒈지소서!

altTitles.th: สลับร่างล้างอธรรม เบอร์ดี้ Evolution

altTitles.ja: 鉄腕バーディー EVOLUTION
鉄腕バーディーEVOLUTION

description.en: After two years of being dormant inside Tsutomu Senkawa, an accidental encounter with their old nemesis violently wakes Birdy up. With Birdy kicking evil's ass once again, the dark secrets of the experiments conducted by the "Agni" corporation are slowly revealed. They seem to be dabbling with human body enhancement, creating what they call "beast men," to combat the alien invasions related to Birdy.

The first collection of volumized short stories by the author of "For You in Full Blossom" / 『花ざかりの君たちへ』 ("Hanazakari no Kimitachi e").   
  
1) The Dreaming Leaf (Yume Miru Happa) -   
Futaba (=Two Leaves) departs for Tokyo to attend high school there. In order to relieve the financial burden slightly and achieve independence, she finds a live-in work situation at an old mansion. She becomes (fighting) friends with one of three good-looking fortune-telling employees there, Masato, who attends her same high school and is even in her same class. But then one day, Futaba discovers the secret of the old mansion… which is–!?   
  
2) 17 Romance (17 [Juunana] Romansu) -   
Natsume, now in high school, was raised like the son her father never had, and so she's determined never to lose out to any man. Homare Misono has been her guy friend for 17 years. Despite their closeness, Natsume always feels the disadvantage her gender places her at. Homare is stronger and better than her at a lot of things. And after saving her from a pervert on the streets, he kisses her…!?  
  
3) The Law of Couples (Futari no Housoku) -   
The Law of Couples states that all things happen in pairs – including people. Sakiko seems to have found her missing half in Akio, a boy in her same class who always seems to say exactly what she's thinking. But who is she falling in love with? Akio, or the part of herself that she sees in him…?   
  
4) Heart Fruit (Haato no Kajitsu) -   
Meron and her best friend, Chiho, both have a crush on Uchiyama! Meron finds out after she's already told Chiho that she has a crush, so she needs to lie about who she likes in order to protect Chiho's feelings. She chooses… Ryou! The scariest, coldest guy in school, rumored to be an underground ring leader! If anyone will reject her love confession, it'll be him! It works, but then Chiho begins to cry for Meron's sake, and Meron turns to mush… she tells Chiho that she'll try harder to win Ryou's love…!? How deep is she going to dig her grave?? But… for some reason, Ryou really doesn't seem that scary to Meron…

altTitles.ja: 奇縁 〜 ゲームと現実がリンクする

altTitles.en: My Lucky Encounter From the Game Turned Into Reality

description.en:
"Who says revenge is vain? It's so fun!"

In a world where magic co-exists with the rule of nobles, Adrian Lawrence seemed to have gotten lucky in life as the second son of a viscount. Despite this, Adrian is an outcast in a home controlled by his scheming step-mother and half-brother, who are set on ousting him. 

Little do they know that Adrian plays the game Chronicle Online, where he possesses great powers that can also be used in reality! 

With heirship to the viscounty up for grabs, can Adrian use his powers to level up his real life?

altTitles.ja: とんがり帽子のアトリエ

description.en:
In a world where everyone takes wonders like magic spells and dragons for granted, Coco is a girl with a simple dream: she wants to be a wizard. 
But everybody knows magicians are born, not made, and she was not born with a gift for magic. 
Resigned to her un-magical life, Coco is about to give up on her dream until the day she meets Qifrey, a mysterious traveling magician. After secretly watching him perform magic in a way she’s never seen before, Coco soon learns what everybody “knows” might not be the truth and discovers that her magical dream may not be as far away as it seems…
  
- Winner of the 2020 Eisner Award for Best U.S. Edition of International Material-Asia.  
- Winner of the Best Manga award at the 2020 Harvey Awards.  


---
